instructions: On your iPhone or iPad, open the Gmail app . Tap Menu and then Settings and then your account and then Manage your Google Account . If you don't use Gmail, go to myaccount.google.com . At the top, tap Security. Under "Signing in to Google," tap 2-Step Verification. Under "Set up alternative second step," find "Authenticator app" and tap Set up . Follow the steps on the screen. To verify it's working, get a code from your Authenticator app. Enter it in your settings.
